scripts.tsnode: echo 'this is an optional alternate way to run typescript files directly. Alternatively, npm run start.' && npm run reminder && ts-node --esm src/index.ts
scripts.query: npm run reminder && npm run build && node dist/src
scripts.migrate: edgedb migration create && edgedb migration apply && npm run generate
scripts.generate: npx @edgedb/generate edgeql-js && npx @edgedb/generate interfaces && npx @edgedb/generate queries --file
scripts.reminder: echo 'reminder to npm run migrate if you changed your schema'
